channel.title: Hardware on Nomad's reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on Nomad's reflections

item.title: x64 Macbook Pro -> Apple Silicon Macbook Pro Max
item.description: Few things motivate me more, than exciting new hardware and music. My last post has been over a year ago, and that was when Synology released new exciting NAS options. Side-tracking a bit, 920+ turned out to be well worth it’s money: a year later it’s still as performant as day 1, though I did have to disable the RW cache on it :). However today the new M1 Pro Max takes spotlight.
